tool_description: Generates demand forecasts using historical sales data, seasonal patterns, and market factors to predict future product demand.

forecast_horizon_days.description: Number of days to forecast ahead (7-365)

confidence_level.description: Statistical confidence level for forecast intervals (0.8-0.99)

error_messages: Insufficient historical data: At least 3 data points required for forecasting.
Invalid forecast horizon: forecast_horizon_days must be between 7 and 365.
Invalid confidence level: confidence_level must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Seasonal factors mismatch: If provided, seasonal_factors must contain exactly 12 values.
usage: Input historical sales data and optional seasonal factors to generate demand forecasts. Adjust forecast_horizon_days and confidence_level based on planning needs and data reliability.

forecasted_demand.description: Predicted daily demand quantities for forecast period

forecast_dates.description: Dates corresponding to each forecast value

confidence_intervals.description: Upper and lower confidence bounds for forecasts

forecast_accuracy_score.description: Expected accuracy score of forecast from 0-100
